SEARCH
Package library.repository

Class InMemoryUserRepository

java.lang.Object
library.repository.InMemoryUserRepository
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserRepository
public class InMemoryUserRepository extends Object implements UserRepository
Simple in-memory implementation of the UserRepository. Stores users inside a list (not persistent).
